授業方法: The class will be conducted online via Zoom (simultaneous and two way). Please see "Note" how to join the first online class. Using a Collaborative Online Learning International Education (COIL) approach, students in this class will work online together with American students on several activities. After creating introductory videos and team building activities, students will work out the differences in HR management and employment between Japan and the US with their American partners and present their findings in class. Based on weekly readings and class discussions, students will also gain an understanding of characteristics and phenomena of the Japanese employment system, supplemented by materials from the instructor, such as newspaper articles, recent statistics and film clips from documentaries and interviews.
